page.title: 19ST.LUKES CHURCH LEAGRAVE
page.content: The{Rev J.Whitlock}is the vicar of St.Lukes Church Leagrave.There are about{20,000 people}in his parish and 350 of them go to church regularly. Before the present church, there were two others. The first one was just a hut and then a better one was built. Unfortunately some boys got into it and burnt it to the ground. The present church was also broken into and set alight at the altar, but luckily one of the two churchwardens saw the smoke and it was put out in time. The vicar at St. Luke's takes{30 {weddings,50 baptisms and 50 funerals on average a year. He says the job is tiring but fun. He used to work in the country, which was quite different. The{Roman Catholics}also use St. Luke's Church, and the{Greek Orthodox Church used to do so, as well.
